attributes.additional_details:
As a species we seek comfort and companionship, whether of our own kind or among the many species we have encountered of the Animal Kingdom. It is our duty to compose and not to destroy either ourselves or each other, or our home-world.

Fortunate to be here to exist and choose our paths, yet not unto violence. Let us protect ourselves and each other, yet not from our selves. There is a world to adapt and align to and within.

But to adapt and create un-towards common goal. And find Peace.

Easy
attributes.background:
We live on Planet Earth.

Heart-break and violence, yet remembrance. 
Political Institution, yet squabble and no - as yet - resolution.
Determination, loving power of willful contribution, and understanding.
A fear and love of and with technology, and wishing to find.
